sentences.sentence: Whoever drinks the poison will die consequentially, which is the unvarying truth.
sentences.translation: 任何喝过此毒酒之人都会相继死去，此乃不变之真理。

sentences.sentence: Any individual will consequentially form certain interpersonal relationships with others during the organizational work of reciprocity.
sentences.translation: 在组织中，任何的个体都必然会在与其他个体的行为互动过程中建立起相应的人际关系。

sentences.sentence: One point is that distance education is more advanced than traditional education. Consequentially, it will replace with the traditional education.
sentences.translation: 一种观点认为远程教育是一种先进的教育形式，它的出现必将替代传统教育。
